/usr/bin/c++    -pthread -fopenmp  -march=native -msse4.2 -mfpmath=sse  -march=native -mavx2  -march=native -mfma  -std=c++14 -pthread -fopenmp  -march=native -msse4.2 -mfpmath=sse  -march=native -mavx2  -march=native -mfma   CMakeFiles/demo_IRR_rot_spring.dir/demo_IRR_rot_spring.cpp.o  -o ../../../bin/demo_IRR_rot_spring -rdynamic ../../../lib64/libChronoEngine_irrlicht.so /usr/local/lib/libIrrlicht.so -lXxf86vm -lglut -lX11 -lGL ../../../lib64/libChronoEngine.so -lpthread -Wl,-rpath,/opt/chrono/chrono_build/lib64:/usr/local/lib:
